thread.title: EnerPlex Generatr(TM) 100 Wins Best of Show Award During CTIA Super Mobility Conference
thread.title_full: EnerPlex Generatr(TM) 100 Wins Best of Show Award During CTIA Super Mobility Conference

title: EnerPlex Generatr(TM) 100 Wins Best of Show Award During CTIA Super Mobility Conference
text:
September 11, 2015 06:00 ET EnerPlex Generatr™ 100 Wins Best of Show Award During CTIA Super Mobility Conference 
THORNTON, CO--(Marketwired - Sep 11, 2015) - Ascent Solar Technologies, Inc. ("Ascent") ( NASDAQ : ASTI ), a manufacturer of state-of-the-art, flexible thin-film photovoltaic modules, integrated into off-grid applications and the Company's EnerPlex™ series of consumer products, announced today the Company's EnerPlex Generatr 100 won a Best of Show Award for the Most Versatile Charging Accessory at the CTIA Super Mobility Conference from iPhone Life Magazine. 
"It is an honor that once again our leading edge design and engineering has been recognized by this product award. The Generatr 100 embodies the concept of Mobility Power, providing power across a wide range of devices in a compact, lightweight and high-performance product." said Justin R. Jacobs, Manager of Brand Development for EnerPlex. 
The EnerPlex Generatr™ 100 is a lightweight and portable power solution for a wide array of consumer electronics. This 100 has USB outputs for phones and tablets, a 12V port for lights, and a standard 110V outlet for powering laptops and other large electronics. The Generatr 100 can be charged via wall outlet, or sun using EnerPlex's patented solar panels. 
About Ascent Solar Technologies: 
Ascent Solar Technologies, Inc. is a developer of thin-film photovoltaic modules using flexible substrate materials that can transform the way solar power generation integrates into everyday life. Ascent Solar modules, which were named one of TIME Magazine's 50 best inventions for 2011, can be directly incorporated into standard building materials, commercial transportation, automotive solutions, space applications, consumer electronics for portable power and durable off-grid solutions. More information can be found at http://www.ascentsolar.com .
